# Sapporo Ainu Culture Promotion Center

The , also known as  or "Beautiful Village", opened in Sapporo, Hokkaido, Japan, in 2003. Dedicated to the Ainu people, their history, culture, and way of life, the museum has some three hundred artefacts on display and there is also a traditional-style cise (dwelling).
See also
* National Ainu Museum
* Hokkaido Museum
* Toyohira River
